Though she received little training, Machielle integrated herself into the Golfsmith marketing team’s project management process quickly and efficiently. Her expert organizational skills, adaptability, and ambition made her an amazing fit with the fast-paced project flow in our department. She even trained another new PM within her first couple of weeks of employment. As a project manager, her friendly and effervescent attitude made working with her a complete delight, even when she was delivering rush projects with tight deadlines. Incredibly driven, she went out of her way to make sure we had any information we needed to complete the project on time. If you’re looking into hiring a dedicated and focused marketing manager, look no further than Machielle Thomas.
